alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:01PM EDT until May 12 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR LOWNDES AND NORTHEASTERN BROOKS COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hahira to near Moody Air Force Base to 7 miles south of Lakeland to near Mayday, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Hahira, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 29, I-75 At Exit 22, I-75 At Exit 11 and I-75 At Exit 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
